Interface DistributionOfTheOutputStream

public interface DistributionOfTheOutputStream
This interface is responsible for managing the output stream for console and file outputs. It allows printing messages either to the console or to a file, depending on the current execution mode. If the script execution mode is active, messages are written to a file; otherwise, they are printed to the console.

  • Method Details

    • clear

      static void clear()
      Clears the output file, if it exists. The output file is located at "data/output.txt".

    • println

      static void println(String message)
      Prints a message to the output. Depending on the execution mode, it either prints to the console or writes to a file.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be printed or written.

    • print

      static void print(String message)
      Prints a message to the output without a newline. Depending on the execution mode, it either prints to the console or writes to a file.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be printed or written.

    • printlnToFile

      static void printlnToFile(String message)
      Writes a message to the output file with a newline. The file is located at "data/output.txt".
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be written to the file.

    • printToFile

      static void printToFile(String message)
      Writes a message to the output file without a newline. The file is located at "data/output.txt".
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be written to the file.
